name: aws_backend
description: This package provides AWS DynamoDB storage services for the Dart SLTT (Sign Language Translation Tool) system, optimized for serverless deployment with minimal cold start time.

scripts.build:linux: rm -f bootstrap && dart compile exe bin/bootstrap.dart -o bootstrap && chmod +x bootstrap
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npx serverless deploy --stage dev --aws-profile sltt-dart-dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npx serverless deploy --stage prod --aws-profile sltt-dart-prd
scripts.logs:dev: npx serverless logs --function api --stage dev --aws-profile sltt-dart-dev --startTime 1h
scripts.logs:prod: npx serverless logs --function api --stage prod --aws-profile sltt-dart-prd --startTime 1h
